channel.title: Cant ever get any clients to work
channel.description:
Everytime I try to use a Silabs client or anyother client I always get this error
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Which I dont understand since I know for a fact I have the latest java.
Any help is appreciated.

item.title: Cant ever get any clients to work
item.dc:creator: @Dannyman231 Dannyman231
item.description:
@Dannyman231 wrote:

ok this was hard for me go to your batch right click edit delete all of it paste this

@echo off
COLOR 08
title BJDJScape Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

if u have the older version and change this 1.6.0_06 to your version

Read full topic
item.source: Cant ever get any clients to work
